import { useEffect, useState } from "react" const Titles = { userid: 'User ID', name: 'Name', surname: 'Surname', eposta: 'Eposta', date: 'Date Of Registration', update: 'Update User', delete: 'Delete User', }; const Home = () => { const [customers, setCustomers] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { const fetchCustomers = async () => { const response = await fetch('/api/customers') const json = await response.json() if (response.ok) { setCustomers(json) } } fetchCustomers() }, []) return (

Admin Panel

Customers List

Add New Customer:

{Object.values(Titles).map((title) => ( ))} {customers && customers.map((customer) => ( ))}

{title}
{customer.ID} {customer.Name} {customer.Surname} {customer.Email} {customer.createdAt}
) } export default Home
